name: Candidate Invaders
description:
Greetings All Ye Stewards of Democracy. As 2016 rumbles forward with the advent of a new President taking the reigns, it appears that there is a Candidate Invasion upon us. Take time out to enjoy a little fun with our candidates as they rally their constituents to vote for them!

- Designed for iPhone 6/6s

- Simulated Space Invaders type Game Play
- Smooth leveling
- Neat Audio and Visual Presentation
- Hilarious
